triples.name: Software verification
triples.relevance: SV-COMP evaluates software verification tools and methodologies for automated program analysis.

triples.name: Memory safety
triples.relevance: Memory safety is one of the key verification specifications evaluated in the competition.

triples.name: Termination analysis
triples.relevance: Termination verification is a core specification category in SV-COMP 2024.

triples.name: Reachability analysis
triples.relevance: Reachability is a primary verification task evaluated across the competition benchmarks.

triples.name: C (programming language)
triples.relevance: 30,300 of the verification tasks in SV-COMP 2024 are C program benchmarks.

triples.name: Java (programming language)
triples.relevance: 587 verification tasks in SV-COMP 2024 are Java program benchmarks.

triples.name: Benchmark (computing)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a new benchmark set with 30,300 verification tasks for C and 587 for Java programs.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: SV-COMP 2024 introduces a new scoring schema for witness validation and advances in formal verification competition frameworks.
